## ContentDisposition enumeration

MIME protocol Content-Disposition header.

```csharp
public enum ContentDisposition
```

### Values

| Name | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Inline | `0` | Result is shown inline. |
| Attachment | `1` | Result is saved as attachment. |
